artist: Artist: Ikeda Shōen; Publisher: Nihon Mokuhan Insatsu Kabushikigaisha Hakkō
creditline: Gift of Ellen and Fred Wells
description: head and shoulders of woman with thick hair, holding the sleeve of her kimono up to her mouth; blue, purple, green and pink striped kimono with red and black collar
markings: publisher: 日本木版印刷株式会社発行 {Nihon Mokuhan Insatsu Kabushikigaisha Hakkō} (Japan Woodblock Print Co.)
medium: Woodblock print; ink and color on paper
portfolio: From Selection of New Ukiyo-e Beauties (Shin ukiyo-e bijin awase 新浮世絵美人合)
text: This design is part of the first set, published in 1918. There was a second set published in c. 1924.
title: November, Indian Summer
